title: Lorena Garcia's Charred Grilled Rack of Lamb in a Wild Mushroom Passion Fruit Sauce

instructions.1: Heat the olive oil, shallots, garlic, and wild mushrooms in a saucepan over medium high heat for approximately 3 minutes.
instructions.2: Add the demi-glace, passion fruit juice and alcohol-free red wine and let simmer for a few minutes. Add the SPLENDA® Sugar Blend for Baking, let simmer for a few minutes until some of the liquid has evaporated and all of the ingredients have blended in together.
instructions.3: Place the racks of lamb on the grill, cook for 3 to 4 minutes, then flip them and cook them for a few minutes until they reach the desired temperature. Place on the middle of the plate.
instructions.4: Drizzle sauce and mushrooms over the rack of lamb.

questions.question: In Step 4, is the lamb from Step 3 being used?
Is lamb from Step 3 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is shallots from Step 1 still available in Step 4?
Is splenda® sugar blend live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 1?
If we skip Step 3, is it still valid to use the lamb in Step 4?
Can we place (Step 3) and drizzle (Step 4) at the same time?
